metadata.Title: CVE-2021-31262 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The AV1_DuplicateConfig function in GPAC 1.0.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a crafted file in the MP4Box command.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
